Device.Name: ADT7301ARTZ-500RL7
Device.Description: The ADT7301 is a complete temperature monitoring system . It contains a band gap temperature sensor and a 13-bit ADC to monitor and digitize the temperature reading to a resolution of 0.03125°„C. The ADT7301 has a flexible serial interface that allows easyinterfacing to most microcontrollers. The interface is compatible with SPI,QSPI,and MICROWIRE protocols as well as DSPs.
Device.KeyWord: ADT7301 Temp, Temperature, Sensor, SPI, ADC
